title: Song of the Loon
description: "You are Ephraim MacIver!"Thus strangers greeted him as he made his way through the wilderness. His coming was heralded ... eagerly awaited by the lonely noblemen of the forest, and they guided him in his search for new meanings to the word love ... for a new self, that he must learn to love before the love of others could be truly his.
author: Richard Amory
